page.title: 13HOUSING:BUILDING SITE
page.content: The building site in Cowfold is situated in SE corner of the village as an extension of Oakfield Road.There are two phases of building.First phase -65 houses-was begun in Jan 1984 and is almost complete:53 houses finished, 45 lived in,12 more to finish.Second phase-approx 40 houses-is about to begin and is expected to take 18mths- 2yrs. There are 1,2 and 3 bedroom houses on the site.Prices range from Â£35,000- Â£65,000.Main drainage,water pipes, electricity and telephone cables are put in before the houses are built. Foundations are 2m deep.Houses are built of brick,breezeblock and clay tiles:softwood for rooftimbers and hardwood for windowframes.It takes 3mths to build an average house using approx 7,500 bricks.Cost of 1,000 bricks = Â£230.
